mcq.statement: Identify the false statement: Energy of IR is higher than the visible light, Energy of UV is higher than the visible light, Energy of IR is lower than the visible light, Energy of UV is higher than IR radiation

options.a: Energy of IR is higher than the visible light
options.b: Energy of UV is higher than the visible light
options.c: Energy of IR is lower than the visible light
options.d: Energy of UV is higher than IR radiation
